question: Which city hosted the 4th edition of Economic Times - Global Business Summit (ET-GBS 2018)?
explanation: The 4th edition of Economic Times - Global Business Summit (ET-GBS 2018) was held in New Delhi with theme \"New Economy â€“ New Rules\" on February 23-24. The GBS is a flagship initiative of the Times Group that envisions to bring together visionaries, thought leaders, heads of state, policy makers, academicians and corporate heads cohesively driving a singular agenda for Scripting Economic Change, by connecting the building blocks of Economics for India and the Globe. It is a platform with multitude of policy makers and industry leaders under one roof.
